author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Crab & Watercress Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crab & Watercress Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch watercress, stalks removed and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Spread 8 slices of medium sliced wholemeal bread with softened butter. Combine 150g crab meat with 3 tbs mayonnaise, 1 bunch watercress, stalks removed and finely chopped, salt and pepper, 1 tbs lemon juice, 1 tbs grated lemon zest, and a pinch of cayenne.
Spread evenly over 4 slices of bread and top with the remaining 4 slices. Cut off the crusts and discard. Cut into 6 sandwiches to serve.
